column6: The direct sequel to Ender's Game begins now!  Thirteen-year-old Ender Wiggin has saved mankind from an alien threat.  His reward?  Exile.  Branded a monster by those who feel threatened by his military genius, Ender is suddenly a hero without a home.  Consumed with guilt, Ender must face his own demons and the people who are bent on stripping him of power.  Based on the bestselling novel by science-fiction master Orson Scott Card. Parental Advisory ...$3.99
column8: | penciller:Sebastian Fiumara | penciller:Pop Mhan | writer:Aaron Johnston
